actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

official_title: To authorize the Administrator of General Services to carry out a project for construction of a Federal courthouse in St. Petersburg, Florida.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the General Services Administration to carry out a project for construction of a public building in St. Petersburg, Florida, which shall be used as a Federal courthouse.

titles.title: To authorize the Administrator of General Services to carry out a project for construction of a Federal courthouse in St. Petersburg, Florida.
